description: From French festif, from Latin festivus (“pertaining to a feast, gay, lively, joyous”). Equivalent to feast +‎ -ive.

adjectives.description: festive (comparative more festive, superlative most festive)

entries.meaning: Having the atmosphere, decoration, or attitude of a festival, holiday, or celebration.
examples: The room was decked out in festive streamers, with flowers everywhere.
Please put the Christmas decorations away, I'm really not in a festive mood.
